name: ArcHive (bpremus, Deezaath, Alios)
description:
So you like bugs, ok whats wrong with you?!

Protect your queen at all cost,  upgrade your drones to warrior, build harvesting buildings and conquer the backyard.  

How to play:

----------------------------------------------

Queen room produces drones, you can use drones in queen room to collect more food or build harvesting room to collect even faster.

Drones can be evolved into warrior bugs to protect the Queen.

... and brace yourself, the night is coming. 

submission for Game Off 2021 GameJam by Deezaath, Alios and Bpremus
